title: Purchase Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.purchase event. Fired when a transaction is successfully completed.

orderId.description: The unique order or transaction identifier.

total.description: The total monetary value of the transaction including tax and shipping.

revenue.description: The revenue from the transaction (total minus tax and shipping).

tax.description: The total tax amount for the transaction.

shipping.description: The total shipping cost for the transaction.

discount.description: The total discount amount applied to the transaction.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the transaction (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

coupon.description: The coupon code applied to the transaction, if any.

paymentMethod.description: The payment method used for the transaction (e.g. 'credit_card', 'paypal', 'apple_pay').

products.description: The list of products included in the transaction.
